definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: In a tactical reload, you are "topping off" your gun with a fresh magazine.
sentences.chinese: 在戰術換彈匣，你是用新的彈匣加滿你的槍。

sentences.english: In a tactical reload, you are "topping off" your gun with a fresh magazine.
sentences.chinese: 在戰術換彈匣，你是用新的彈匣加滿你的槍。

sentences.english: When in doubt, empty your magazine.
sentences.chinese: 有懷疑的時候，先打空你的彈匣再說。

sentences.english: The rifle is fitted with a 30-round magazine and can fire single shots or bursts.
sentences.chinese: 步槍配備有一個30發彈匣和能點射或連射。

sentences.english: If you finish, you may  unload and show clear.
sentences.chinese: 如你已完成射擊，可退出彈匣及展示已退彈之空槍膛。

sentences.english: When in doubt, vacant your journal.
sentences.chinese: 有懷疑的時候，先打空你的彈匣再說。

sentences.english: Cheap mags are fun to buy.
sentences.chinese: 買便宜的彈匣很有意思。

sentences.english: If you finish, you may unload and show clear.
sentences.chinese: 如你已實現射擊，可退出彈匣及展示已退彈之空槍膛。
